# The `DiagnosticInfoIROptimization` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Common features for diagnostics dealing with optimization remarks that are used by IR passes.

Definition at line 695 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### DiagnosticInfoIROptimization() {#a94b851bbca9f77b7fed2a087827a9408}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::DiagnosticInfoIROptimization::DiagnosticInfoIROptimization (enum <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a52b4ea3a21377555e9a0511d57945594">DiagnosticKind</a> Kind, enum <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfcab32516704f11d146c757f402ad5c">DiagnosticSeverity</a> Severity, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RemarkName, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; Fn, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticlocation">DiagnosticLocation</a> &amp; Loc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; CodeRegion=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<code>PassName</code> is the name of the pass emitting this diagnostic.

<code>RemarkName</code> is a textual identifier for the remark (single-word, camel-case). <code>Fn</code> is the function where the diagnostic is being emitted. <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a></code> is the location information to use in the diagnostic. If line table information is available, the diagnostic will include the source code location. <code>CodeRegion</code> is IR value (currently basic block) that the optimization operates on. This is currently used to provide run-time hotness information with PGO.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00706">706</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### DiagnosticInfoIROptimization() {#a301d0e866440a41b832972c897f2dc5c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::DiagnosticInfoIROptimization::DiagnosticInfoIROptimization (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Prepend, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticinfoiroptimization">DiagnosticInfoIROptimization</a> &amp; Orig)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
This is ctor variant allows a pass to build an optimization remark from an existing remark.

This is useful when a transformation pass (e.g LV) wants to emit a remark (<code>Orig</code>) generated by one of its analyses (e.g. LAA) as its own analysis remark. The string <code>Prepend</code> will be emitted before the original message.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00723">723</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### DiagnosticInfoIROptimization() {#aa192c95c53dffca890dcffcae58795f0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::DiagnosticInfoIROptimization::DiagnosticInfoIROptimization (enum <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a52b4ea3a21377555e9a0511d57945594">DiagnosticKind</a> Kind, enum <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfcab32516704f11d146c757f402ad5c">DiagnosticSeverity</a> Severity, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; Fn, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticlocation">DiagnosticLocation</a> &amp; Loc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; Msg)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Legacy interface.

<code>PassName</code> is the name of the pass emitting this diagnostic. <code>Fn</code> is the function where the diagnostic is being emitted. <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a></code> is the location information to use in the diagnostic. If line table information is available, the diagnostic will include the source code location. <code>Msg</code> is the message to show. Note that this class does not copy this message, so this reference must be valid for the whole life time of the diagnostic.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00741">741</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
